website_summaries.verdict: The Merrell Agility Peak Flex 3 is a reliable trail running shoe designed for neutral pronators. It received positive reviews from users because of its quality design, comfortable upper and responsive cushioning. Though it is slightly expensive compared to other trail shoes, the Agility Peak Flex 3 is still a good option for those who are looking for a high-mileage running shoe.
pros: The Merrell Agility Peak Flex 3 is very comfortable even on long walks, said some users
According to some reviews, the shoe offers a great level of support and stability
Many runners agreed that the shoe fits well, from the heel to the forefoot
Several buyers lauded the shoes durable construction
A few wearers noticed the upper wraps the foot snugly
The Agility Peak Flex 3 offers durable traction on varied surfaces, based on some user reviews
Most runners lauded the shoe’s responsive cushioning

customer_reviews.title: Great summer shoes - Order 1/2 size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my husband. They run large, so had to re-order 1/2 size smaller than what he normally wears in Merrill. Otherwise they are great summer shoes, comfy and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: DaFish

customer_reviews.title: Good trail shoe, fit as expected, very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I did not order these shoes for trail running. I needed a comfortable pair of trail shoes for driving to Colorado and Utah for some off roading and hiking. I was looking for something that was not the normal brown color that a lot of hiking shoes are that would look good for going into towns for shopping/lunch/dinner. They fit well, looked good, and were very comfortable. I was never in any sort of rain or mud so I can not speak to them being water resistant or water proof. Over all was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Wood

customer_reviews.title: and absolutely love Merrell shoes
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected. I have a wide foot, and absolutely love Merrell shoes. I got these in a 9.5 (not wide, because they didn't have them). Since I wear a wide, they scrubbed a little on the outer toe at first, but then they were fine and I wore them about a year before the insoles started wearing down. I recommend Merrell shoes to anyone that has a high arch, I am a nurse and on my feet all day, Merrells seem to hug my feet and support my arch so that my legs and feet don't hurt when I get home.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: wonderful merrell shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have worn the merreill ventilator boots for years. I have worn out three pairs. I went to buy another and saw these shoes. Very comfortable for light hiking and day wear. The merrells are wide, I have a wide foot, high arch and narrow heel. The shoe is a bit stiffer and less padded than the ventilator . I am considering a little added cushioning. I live in the NW, and wear both shoes in the rain. I tried the heaver rain merrell boot and really disliked them, they were much heavier. I wear hiking boots or shoes everyday except high summer, then i switch to chaco sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage PowerReader

customer_reviews.title: Merrell Kimsey Hiking shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit when I first put it on, before I laced them. But my instep swells (due to arthritis) as the day progresses and I have to loosen and loosen and then there is ultimately no lace left to tie. I will be buying longer laces - stretchy ones maybe. I can wear them for the first part of the day and they are very comfy. But alas I still must take them off in the afternoon. The arch support is very good but it's the tops of my feet that are the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Pati C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality shoes! I have bought Merrell brand before and have never been disappointed. Shoes are great for hiking or walking on rocks, in snow...especially if you are the out-doorsy type. The inside is cushy. Only one drawback I noticed and it is not really a big deal, but one of the shoe laces on one shoe is shorter than the other....a minor fix. Still..I love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: S. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Coming from someone who wears Nike's. These shoes are amazing. They are comfortable, affordable, and durable. My feet feel great walking/running.
customer_reviews.author: Austin G

customer_reviews.title: they were best shoe I ever had
customer_reviews.text: I got my first pair of Merrell women's hiking shoe 3 years ago from a local shoe store ,they were best shoe I ever had. These were my 2nd pair and they look cheap,fit small and hurt for weeks. I doubt they are the real brand ,if it they are then they cheapened their quality.I gave them to a thrift store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy hiking shoe with good support
customer_reviews.text: This shoe comes with good stability support that comes with this shoe. I would say the shoe is only a tad large, which I prefer. It seems to have a wider toe box area, which I also prefer. I've enjoyed wearing this shoe on my nature hikes and have even bought it in another color.
customer_reviews.author: LYJ

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: Product was awesome but definitely not true to size. Actually about 2 sizes too big
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Spangler

customer_reviews.title: These fit as an 8. 5 B should, ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit as an 8.5 B should, but can't wear my orthotics. The footbed is too shallow. Wore these for a big trade show, concrete convention center floor, for two weeks, averaging about 9 miles a day. Even though I had three pairs of shoes that I rotated, I wore these most of the days with no need to change, and no blisters or rubbing. Not as comfy as my ventilators, but for $50, such a value.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Foley

customer_reviews.title: A good hiking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of hiking shoes, well made and comfortable for my right foot. The left shoe rubbed against the outside of my foot,unfortunately. A bit bulky for my taste, but I would of kept them if the left shoe fit as well as the right!
customer_reviews.author: mmm114

customer_reviews.title: Narrow.... beware
customer_reviews.text: Attempted to wear shoes for Disney but were way narrow and will not wear again. Of course outside return time so hopefully will find another home.
customer_reviews.author: FCF

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit ordered 1/2 size larger. Shoe is light weight well made and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Steven AZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 different shoes, the UA was the least expensive and fit the best. Most comfortable. I returned the other 2 which were twice and three times as expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Are they real merrells?
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems lower than my previous pair of merrells. Previous pair lasted 5 years across a dozen countries. This pair? I've barely had them a year and they look extremely shabby. I was very loyal to this brand so this is a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: MBrainspaz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit - Excellect shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these shows!! They felt perfect from the first moment I put them on. I have very flat feet and I need really good support and these shoes do it all. I am extremely pleased with them. I will be ordering another pair soon. The price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I only wore the shoes twice. the run way too small. I’m not even sure if they’re real Merrill’s.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really love the shoes but I wish I had not listened ...
customer_reviews.text: I really love the shoes but I wish I had not listened to other reviewers to size up a half size and just got my regular size. My feet slide around a bit, especially hiking down hill and it becomes uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: December Redhead

customer_reviews.title: YOU CAN NEVER GO WRONG WITH MERELLS
customer_reviews.text: A great shoe! YOU CAN NEVER GO WRONG WITH MERELLS! Great fit. You can walk miles in them from the get go. No need for breaking them in. They are cute to boot (no pun intended)! Look great with yoda pants, cute little tennis skirt or a t-shirt dress. Great for city and country terrain. They have nice a grip on them event in rainy, slick streets!
customer_reviews.author: VaVa

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable with good support
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable walking shoe. I bought a 2nd pair as a result of using them for a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: ART J

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! I bought this for my 76 year ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! I bought this for my 76 year old mother who is not a hiker but needed a sturdy shoe to walk around inside a national park. These were perfect and she said they were light and comfortable to wear during the whole trip.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes but they run big. I got my usual 14 and they are really big on me. All other Merrells I’ve ordered were 14 and fit perfect. I should have gotten 13.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pegler

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and right to size.
customer_reviews.text: I love Merrell shoes and boots. They are so comfortable and the fit is spot on. Slipping your foot into a Merrell shoe is like that perfect awwww. Planning to walk the Camino and I think these might just be going along.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure about these shoes with bad reviews but so far I have hiked 10 miles ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about these shoes with bad reviews but so far I have hiked 10 miles in them in rough terrain without issues. I wear them on errands too to continue breaking them in. I like them so far, wear proper hiking socks with them and you are set.
customer_reviews.author: E.S.

customer_reviews.title: a really nice shoe, and it was for a great price
customer_reviews.text: To be fair, a really nice shoe, and it was for a great price. No seller issues; fast shipping and easy return process. These are just really wide shoes, in a 7B, for someone who usually wears a 7-7.5B. Also, the heel is kind of huge.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hiking and everday life
customer_reviews.text: Love these. The fit was great for length and width of foot. They are very comfortable for hiking and wearing as everyday shoes. Since they are dark, I wear them often around doing errands. They have really saved my arch, as light weight cross trainers do not have enough support due to my long term feet issues. I own two pairs now - one for hiking, one for mommy-ing.
customer_reviews.author: monster2

customer_reviews.title: Painful after 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Italy. Luckily, I put them on to take a brisk walk around my neighborhood before taking them on the trip. After about 5 minutes of walking, they started to hurt my feet horribly. The insole seems to curve up on the outside edges. This caused throbbing pain to radiate from the outer edge of my feet towards my arches. At least I figured out the problem with the shoes before a 10 day trip where we will be walking miles each day.
customer_reviews.author: Kris L. Coronado

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe, I wear them for many different events ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe, I wear them for many different events whether I am hiking, walking or just doing outside chores.
customer_reviews.author: jharrison

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great buy
customer_reviews.text: They fit as expected. I took my first hike in them on Friday and they were very comfortable up until the last mile. I think the arch support could be better. Overall a great shoe. Every foot is different. The color was accurate. The cushioning was great.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: I'm always very happy with Merrell shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm always very happy with Merrell shoes. These were the same size as I've ordered for a few years, but they were just a little shorter than the others.
customer_reviews.author: karenska

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for any type of running!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Merrell Agility Peak Flex shoes. Love the comfort/durability. I not only run mountain races with them but found shoe is extremely comfortable for any type of running. Have not bought a traditional running shoe in awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order true shoe size.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a half size up, because I was going to wear sports socks, but that didn't work. Really like the look of these shoes, but my feet were sliding around in them.
customer_reviews.author: Sojee

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: But I wasn't sure if I should get a 5 1/2 or 6. I may get another pair to see if the 5 1/2 fit better. But I can wear 2 pairs of socks and regardless I love the shoe and my feet do not hurt!
customer_reviews.author: gracemarie serafina

customer_reviews.title: Great foot support but not the best fit for me
customer_reviews.text: Went a size up based on reviews and they were too large. Used gel insert but then my heel slipped out. Shoe had definite ankle and foot support but bottom was kind of hard. Decided to shop a box store to fine a Merrill shoe that I truly liked rather than settle for a less than optimal fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fit as expected and are very comfortable. I have back issues so I have to ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit as expected and are very comfortable. I have back issues so I have to be picky about my shoes. These shoes are great! I can wear them all day without my back hurting. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Stargel

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Merrell walking shoes for years and they never disappoint! Comfortable from the first wearing. Stylish and practical at the same time. Well made and long wearing. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: fit better and are more comfortable overall
customer_reviews.text: After trying innumerable hiking and sport shoes during my lifetime, for the last several shoes I don’t buy any brand except Merrell now! They wear longer, fit better and are more comfortable overall.
customer_reviews.author: Beverley H Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have helped my knee and heel problems . Fit from day 1 !!! Love them
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are very light, comfortable and warm. I will buy the other colors soon. Fit normal size.
customer_reviews.author: B. Walter

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for son
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of Merrells for my son. Great quality, he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Ylekiot86

customer_reviews.title: ... on a 5 mile hike and they were very comfortable thank you
customer_reviews.text: Wore them just once on a 5 mile hike and they were very comfortable thank you. Very good quality
customer_reviews.author: YOGA

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a WEEK!
customer_reviews.text: Bummed. We always buy Merrill. The soul fell off within the first week of wearing. Was on the Grand Canyon and couldn’t return.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable,great support. Bought these for my husband. Merrill as always is a great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love them !!!! Most comfortable shoe I've ever worn ! I walk an average of 6 to 7 miles or more a day for my job......I will be buying another pair I like them so much ! Order the same pair for a friend and she can't believe how comfortable they are!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Ranville

customer_reviews.title: Merrell womens hicking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are too tight. The making of the shoes are shoddy. Merrell shoes use to be super.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My job requires a lot of walking and the shoes have held up well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I am a women's size nine and the shoes fit perfectly. My job requires a lot of walking and the shoes have held up well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: wilde_thing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn as yet but so far they are a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: NewMe

customer_reviews.title: Always enjoy stepping into a pair of Merrell
customer_reviews.text: Always enjoy stepping into a pair of Merrell; one of the few shoes I can wear a full shift with no aches or foot problem fresh out of the box !
customer_reviews.author: Kim m richardson

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this show in 8.5 and it was a little snug. I reordered in 9 and the 9 was smaller then the 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look of the shoe but way too small
customer_reviews.author: Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Okay pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable.they are wearing fast and aren't waterproof like I thought they would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very SATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: Hike on the bright angel trail into the Grand Canyon just a little bit past Indian Gardens. Total 12 1/2 hours. Very happy with this brand of hiking shoes, at the end of my hike my feet feel great and still intact. Prior to my purchase I read all the reviews I ordered a half-size up and I broke them in prior to our hike. Very happy with this brand of hiking shoes, at the end of my hike my feet feel great and still intact. Prior to my purchase I read all the reviews I ordered a half-size up and I brought them in prior to our hike. I highly recommend these brand I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe. They didn't need breaking in before I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. They didn't need breaking in before I took a 2 mile walk two days in a row.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Only reason it is not 5 stars is that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Only reason it is not 5 stars is that it does not feel to snug around the opening of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: vinther

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I like the look and love the laces.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Owens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice shoe! They fit comfortably and are true to size. Very pretty, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrip

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable with good support
customer_reviews.text: I really like the fit of these shoes. Comfortable on first wearing, having walked over 7miles. I didn't give them a five due to I need to see how they continue to wear and what the life span will be.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Gabrielan

customer_reviews.title: ended up getting rid of them
customer_reviews.text: got rid of the shoes. all they did was make noise everywhere I walked. never had shoes do this before. bought another pair at the store
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were for my daughter she loves them her feet don't hurt after being on them all day.
customer_reviews.author: VRGoody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They Are excellent! Used them and used them and still no issues! A super great deal!
customer_reviews.author: roxiB

customer_reviews.title: ... a little bit short but not enough to be bad. With that said
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair Of Merrell's and they fit just a little bit short but not enough to be bad. With that said, I do love them! Very comfortable, light weight, and after very long work days my feet are still happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sally K

customer_reviews.title: they fit great, I love them
customer_reviews.text: I was able to wear them the first day, for 16 hours on my feet, no breaking them in, they fit great, I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa J.Gaylord

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and great fit. I'm used to wearing sneakers so these shoes are bit heavy for me. I still like them for its comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jwang

customer_reviews.title: Great Hikers
customer_reviews.text: Great hiking shoes! -- replacement for my old Merrill "Calia" hikers. Very similar. Comfort & good support.
customer_reviews.author: Jane H. Brower

customer_reviews.title: Merrill's are extremely comfortable. I wear them every morning when I walk ...
customer_reviews.text: Merrill's are extremely comfortable. I wear them every morning when I walk three miles!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C.

customer_reviews.title: But these are very comfortable shoes. What I like most is that they ...
customer_reviews.text: I stated that there was not enough Arch support only because I have flat feet and need more arch support than normal. But these are very comfortable shoes. What I like most is that they provide significant ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: ... them long hours hiking in Iceland and they were perfect!.
customer_reviews.text: I wore them long hours hiking in Iceland and they were perfect!.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

product_meta.title: Merrell Kimsey, Women's Low Rise Hiking Shoes
product_meta.description:
Navigate water crossings and gnarly terrain with the athletic responsiveness and intuitive control of our kimsey: our next generation of fast, fluid and lightweight hiking shoes.

MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION
What began in the Green Mountains in Vermont, USA, now roams the world. For over 26 years, Merrell has been providing outdoor enthusiasts with quality performance footwear. As the needs of the outdoor enthusiasts have changed, so too has Merrell's approach to addressing those needs. The concept of outdoor has broadened overtime, to include all types of activities and environments - both natural and urban. Merrell is driven to keep pace with this evolution of The New Outdoor concept, and continues to evolve. It has been written that what is important is not the destination, but the journey. So join us as we take you through the Merrell journey - from all-leather hiking boots to plastic telemarking boots to the moc that created the Aftersport category.
